title: Metal Trailer
item_description:
Metal Trailer

Trailer Details

  • License: HJ9845
    • RECORD NOT ON FILE

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 146”
  • Overall Width: 72”
  • Overall Height: 43”
  • Deck Length: 98”
  • Deck Width: 48”
  • Side Height: 9”
  • Width Between Fenders: 48”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Brake Type: None
  • Number of Wheels: 2
  • Tire Size: 8.25r20
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: Pintle Hitch

Note: Bill of Sale only. This item either had one of the following categories: 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore, the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 3 weeks after removal ends on the 28th. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
